topics.body:
So I just randomly remembered the counter monkey where spoony talked about planescape and I seem to remember him saying something about how literally anything could be a portal to planescape and literally anything could be the ritual to open it. Which is a goddamn terrifying concept. 

Like imagine your shower door is the one portal that is activated by humming the ghostbusters theme off key. Now imagine one day after a bill Murray marathon you take a shower, get out and reach for the towel to get the shampoo out of your eyes
But then you realize you're not in your bathroom,you're in some bizzare city. And the handful of cloth in your hand isn't your towel but the robes belonging to _her_
!i.imgur.com/HGhbbHI.jpg!
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
